description.value:
Gain any one skill that has no prerequisites (GM has final say). Gain a single Common Lore Skill, or improve one you already have by one level.
You react violently to the concept of imprisonment or loss of your freedom, you may make a Willpower Test to avert this, difficult modified by GM.
